ROTHFLMAO!!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Eric VanDuzer 
  To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 07, 2009 1:16 PM
  Subject: =
[EVP-ITC] The Script





  here is the script I said I would write.  Now p=
lease no hate mail this is just a satire



  WILLY:     WILLY HAYS HERE WO=
NDERING IF YOU HAVE LOST SOMEONE RECENTLY??  WHERE THEY RICH AND YOU WANT T=
O FIND THERE HIDDEN STASH?  DID THEY HAVE SOMETHING THEY WANTED TO TELL YOU=
 AND NEVER GOT THE CHANCE OR DID YOU HAVE SOMETHING YOU WANTED TO TELL THEM=
??  WELL NOW YOU CAN WITH THE ONE AND ONLY "FRANKS BOX"!!!!  JUST PLUG IT I=
N AND AWAY YOU GO!!

  BOX USER:     "FRANKS BOX" IS GREAT!!  ALL I DID WAS=
 PLUG IT ON AND LISTENED TO THE DIAL SWEEP THE RADIO BANDS.  I ASKED IF MY =
DEAD UNCLE WAS THERE AND IF HE REALLY DID MOLEST ME AS A CHILD??  AND THE B=
OX SAID YES I DID!!  FINALLY SOME CLOSURE!!

  WILLY:     SKEPTICS BEWARE!!=
!  THIS IS THE REALLY REAL THING!!! BELIEVERS BEWARE!!!! THE RESULTS MAY SH=
OCK YOU!!!!  ARE YOU SPEAKING WITH THE DEAD, BEINGS FROM AN INTER-DIMENSION=
AL REALM, ET'S!! WHO KNOWS, YOU ARE TALKING TO SOMEONE!!!!

  BOX USER:  TH=
E BOX IS AMAZING!!! I ASKED IT IF MY GREAT GREAT COUSINS BROTHER WAS MURDER=
ED, AND IT SAID YES AND IT EVEN TOLD ME WHERE IN THE WALL HE WAS BURIED

  =
CHRIS MOON:  I CAN'T SEE WHY I CANT GET THIS DAMN THING TO WORK!!!! I AM GO=
ING TO GO BACK TO MY BOX WHICH ONLY I CAN UNDERSTAND IF YOU WANNA WATCH ME =
PLAY WITH MY BOX, MAIL $6000 DOLLARS TO ME AND THEN WAIT FOR ME AT EASTERN =
STATE PENN ON SATURDAY AND I MIGHT SHOW UP.

  JOHN EDWARDS:  WHY DO I NEED=
 A BOX I CAN DO IT WITHOUT.....

  WILLY:     WHAT WOULD YOU EXPECT TO PAY =
FOR SOMETHING LIKE THIS $1000.00, 1500, 2000......NO!!!!!!! NOT EVEN CLOSE =
CALL NOW AND PAY JUST 15 EASY PAYMENT OF 89.99.......BUT WAIT I AM STILL NO=
T DONE..... BE ONE OF THE NEXT 50 CALLERS AND I WILL KNOCK 14 PAYMENTS OFF =
AND EVEN GIVE YOU FREE SHIPPING.  YOU JUST PAY HANDLING...........BUT WAIT =
I AM STILL NOT DONE BE ONE OF THE NEXT 20 CALLERS AND YOU GET A "BEEP IF YO=
U HATE CHRIS MOON BUMPER STICKER"  THANKS FOR WATCHING FOLKS!!!!!!!
